org.restlet.ext.swagger

Interface SwaggerDescribable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwaggerWrapper

    public interface SwaggerDescribable
    Interface that any Restlet can implement in order to provide their own Swagger documentation. This is especially useful for subclasses of Directory or other resource finders when the Swagger introspection can't reach ServerResource or better SwaggerServerResource instances.
    Author:
    Thierry Boileau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceInfo getResourceInfo(ApplicationInfo applicationInfo)
      Returns a full documented ResourceInfo instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceInfo

        ResourceInfo getResourceInfo(ApplicationInfo applicationInfo)
        Returns a full documented ResourceInfo instance.
        Parameters:
        applicationInfo - The parent Swagger application descriptor.
        Returns:
        A full documented ResourceInfo instance.
